item.title: Yesheng Liang
item.author: liang2kl@outlook.com (Liang Yesheng)
item.description: I am Yesheng Liang (梁业升), a master student at CSE, UC San Diego. I received my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and Technology from Tsinghua University. I like building interesting applications, as well as the lower-level systems that support them. I’m currently working on efficient machine learning systems with Prof. Zhijian Liu. If you’re curious about me beyond academics, feel free to check out my blog (in Chinese), or the photo gallery.
